content: Checking my understanding here. The lint modules in clippy_lints shouldn't have pub functions or types. If code needs to be shared it goes in clippy_utils. Is this right?
In general, yes, there are some exceptions, like the declared lint and configuration values. If you found an util function that is useful for several lints, it's better to move it into clippy_utils
You can also open a PR if you want some early feedback on a specific change :upside_down:

I think rls used stuff from clippy lints crate once?
no idea whats the status on that though

A quick search of the RLS repo only brings up 3 uses:
